xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 18 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 09:24 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 10:54 <bvancea_> has joined #medsavant 12:18 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:19 <sdumitriu1> Hey all 12:19 <bvancea_> hey sdumitriu 12:20 <bvancea_> what's up? 12:20 <sdumitriu1> Not much 12:20 <sdumitriu1> You? 12:20 <bvancea_> indexing some more variants 12:21 <bvancea_> and reading up for an exam, in parallel 12:21 <bvancea_> ;)) 12:21 <sdumitriu1> Tomorrow is your last exam? 12:21 <bvancea_> yup 12:21 <bvancea_> :D 12:23 <bvancea_> this week is sort of messed up tho 12:24 <bvancea_> I've found out last evening that my paper was accepted to a local conference 12:24 <bvancea_> and now the advisor wants some meetings 12:25 <bvancea_> to discuss any edits for the final version 12:25 <bvancea_> and to see a presentation 12:25 <bvancea_> I wasn't even aware you get to do final versions for articles 12:26 <sdumitriu1> First paper? 12:26 <bvancea_> yup 12:28 <bvancea_> I was under the impression that you sort of like write it once and then you've got your name on some conference proceedings 12:33 <bvancea_> btw, is there a date set up for the meeting on Thursday? 12:33 <bvancea_> and will it only be you, me and brian? 12:35 <sdumitriu1> Only us 3 12:36 <sdumitriu1> No hour set yet 12:37 <bvancea_> ah, okay :) 14:27 <sdumitriu1> mcupak: See these two commits 14:34 <mcupak> sdumitriu: hey, yeah, it's better to have it in nbactions.xml, thanks 15:04 <bvancea_> so, is it spam if reply with a +1 to that vote proposal email? 15:04 <sdumitriu1> No 15:04 <sdumitriu1> Well, depends 15:05 <sdumitriu1> If you just send a +1, it is a bit 15:05 <sdumitriu1> If you have something else to say, it's valuable feedback 15:11 <bvancea_> I see 15:12 <bvancea_> well, the vote system sounds cool 15:12 <bvancea_> I haven't heard about it before 15:28 <sdumitriu1> It's a standard practice 15:29 <sdumitriu1> I think Apache is the org that's using it the most 15:29 <sdumitriu1> http://www.apache.org/foundation/voting.html 15:44 <bvancea_> nice 15:45 <bvancea_> and they even have fractions 15:45 <bvancea_> bit overkill imo
